brewing: 2g for 200ml of water at 70-80ï¿½C. Steep for 2 -3 mins.
food_pairing: Excellent with fish and other white meat. Serve without milk.
ingredients:
Fujian Jasmine Pearl Green Tea with Moroccan Rose wrapped in a silken sachet

Click here for more Green Teas
meta_description: A multi-award winning tea and one of our best sellers. This is a well-balanced jasmine green tea that uses good quality Jasmine Pearls, is light-bodied and has a subtle hint of Moroccan Rose
meta_title: Green Tea | Pearl of the Orient | Artisan Selection | Award-Winning Tea
name: Pearl of the Orient Green Tea
nice_flowery_sentence:
One of our Best Selling Green Teas and a 2014 Great Taste Awards Winner, this is what the judges had to say: 

"A well-balanced tea with good use of Jasmine Pearls, this green tea is light-bodied with a subtle hint of rose"

Past Awards: Great Taste Award 2012, Great Taste Award 2011
tasting_notes: An aromatic tea with exquisite flavours of rose petals, the Pearl of the Orient is made of good quality hand-spun pearls of jasmine-infused green tea leaves that embraces the scent of a garden in full bloom.
